basic.description: The experimental basis and mathematical description of electrostatics, magnetostatics and electromagnetic induction, together with a discussion of the properties of dielectrics and ferromagnetics, are presented. Both the integral and vector forms of Maxwell's equations are deduced.
basic.subject: ENPH
basic.title: Eng. Electricity & Magnetism

extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQ: MTHE 227 or MATH 227 or MTHE 280 or MATH 280 and APSC 111 and APSC 112. Must be registered in BSCE.
